description:
After a dreamy space racer gets the VIP treatment at Boobies, Dandy enters an intergalactic grand prix to impress the lovely ladies at his favorite breastaurant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Race in Space Is Dangerous, Baby
Uchuu Race wa Dangerous Jan yo
Une course de l`espace, c`est dangerous, baby
宇宙レースはデンジャラスじゃんよ
